get.summary: Logs returns logs of the PMM-Server.

post.summary: AWSInstanceCheck checks AWS EC2 instance ID.
PlatformSignIn links that PMM instance to Percona Platform user.
PlatformSignOut logouts this PMM instance from Percona Platform account.
PlatformSignUp creates a new Percona Platform user.
ChangeSettings changes PMM Server settings.
GetSettings returns current PMM Server settings.
CheckUpdates checks PMM Server updates availability.
StartUpdate starts PMM Server update.
UpdateStatus returns PMM Server update status.
AddAzureDatabaseExporter adds azure_database_exporter Agent.
AddExternalExporter adds external_exporter Agent.
AddMongoDBExporter adds mongodb_exporter Agent.
AddMySQLdExporter adds mysqld_exporter Agent.
AddNodeExporter adds node_exporter Agent.
AddPMMAgent adds pmm-agent Agent.
AddPostgresExporter adds postgres_exporter Agent.
AddProxySQLExporter adds proxysql_exporter Agent.
AddQANMongoDBProfilerAgent adds MongoDB Profiler QAN Agent.
AddQANMySQLPerfSchemaAgent adds MySQL PerfSchema QAN Agent.
AddQANMySQLSlowlogAgent adds MySQL PerfSchema QAN Agent.
AddQANPostgreSQLPgStatMonitorAgent adds PostgreSQL Pg Stat Monitor QAN Agent.
AddQANPostgreSQLPgStatementsAgent adds PostgreSQL Pg Stat Statements QAN Agent.
AddRDSExporter adds rds_exporter Agent.
ChangeAzureDatabaseExporter changes_database azure_database_exporter Agent.
ChangeExternalExporter changes external_exporter Agent.
ChangeMongoDBExporter changes mongodb_exporter Agent.
ChangeMySQLdExporter changes mysqld_exporter Agent.
ChangeNodeExporter changes node_exporter Agent.
ChangePostgresExporter changes postgres_exporter Agent.
ChangeProxySQLExporter changes proxysql_exporter Agent.
ChangeQANMongoDBProfilerAgent changes MongoDB Profiler QAN Agent.
ChangeQANMySQLPerfSchemaAgent changes MySQL PerfSchema QAN Agent.
ChangeQANMySQLSlowlogAgent changes MySQL PerfSchema QAN Agent.
ChangeQANPostgreSQLPgStatMonitorAgent changes PostgreSQL Pg Stat Monitor QAN Agent.
ChangeQANPostgreSQLPgStatementsAgent changes PostgreSQL Pg Stat Statements QAN Agent.
ChangeRDSExporter changes rds_exporter Agent.
GetAgent returns a single Agent by ID.
ListAgents returns a list of all Agents.
RemoveAgent removes Agent.
AddContainerNode adds Container Node.
AddGenericNode adds generic Node.
AddRemoteNode adds remote Node.
AddRemoteAzureDatabaseNode adds remote Azure database Node.
AddRemoteRDSNode adds remote RDS Node.
GetNode returns a single Node by ID.
ListNodes returns a list of all Nodes.
RemoveNode removes Node.
AddExternalService adds External Service.
AddHAProxyService adds HAProxy Service.
AddMongoDBService adds MongoDB Service.
AddMySQLService adds MySQL Service.
AddPostgreSQLService adds PostgreSQL Service.
AddProxySQLService adds ProxySQL Service.
GetService returns a single Service by ID.
ListServices returns a list of all Services.
RemoveService removes Service.
CancelAction stops an Action.
GetAction gets an result of given Action.
StartMongoDBExplainAction starts MongoDB EXPLAIN Action.
StartMySQLExplainAction starts MySQL EXPLAIN Action with traditional output.
StartMySQLExplainJSONAction starts MySQL EXPLAIN Action with JSON output.
StartMySQLExplainTraditionalJSONAction starts MySQL EXPLAIN Action with traditional JSON output.
StartMySQLShowCreateTableAction starts MySQL SHOW CREATE TABLE Action.
StartMySQLShowIndexAction starts MySQL SHOW INDEX Action.
StartMySQLShowTableStatusAction starts MySQL SHOW TABLE STATUS Action.
StartPTMongoDBSummaryAction starts pt-mongodb-summary Action.

schema.$ref: #/components/schemas/Message to retrieve the prepared ptmongodbsummary data

post.summary: StartPTMySQLSummaryAction starts pt--mysql-summary Action.

schema.$ref: #/components/schemas/Message to retrieve the prepared ptmysqlsummary data

post.summary: StartPTPgSummaryAction starts pt-pg-summary Action.

schema.$ref: #/components/schemas/Message to retrieve the prepared ptpgsummary data

post.summary: StartPTSummaryAction starts pt-summary Action.
StartPostgreSQLShowCreateTableAction starts PostgreSQL SHOW CREATE TABLE Action.
StartPostgreSQLShowIndexAction starts PostgreSQL SHOW INDEX Action.
AddAnnotation adds annotation.

AddExternal adds external service and adds external exporter.
It automatically adds a service to inventory, which is running on provided "node_id",
then adds an "external exporter" agent to inventory, which is running on provided "runs_on_node_id".

AddHAProxy adds HAProxy service and adds external exporter.
It automatically adds a service to inventory, which is running on provided "node_id",
then adds an "external exporter" agent to inventory.

AddMongoDB adds MongoDB Service and starts several Agents.
It automatically adds a service to inventory, which is running on provided "node_id",
then adds "mongodb_exporter", and "qan_mongodb_profiler" agents
with provided "pmm_agent_id" and other parameters.

AddMySQL adds MySQL Service and starts several Agents.
It automatically adds a service to inventory, which is running on provided "node_id",
then adds "mysqld_exporter", and "qan_mysql_perfschema" agents
with provided "pmm_agent_id" and other parameters.
RegisterNode registers a new Node and pmm-agent.

AddPostgreSQL adds PostgreSQL Service and starts postgres exporter.
It automatically adds a service to inventory, which is running on provided "node_id",
then adds "postgres_exporter" with provided "pmm_agent_id" and other parameters.

AddProxySQL adds ProxySQL Service and starts several Agents.
It automatically adds a service to inventory, which is running on provided "node_id",
then adds "proxysql_exporter" with provided "pmm_agent_id" and other parameters.
AddRDS adds RDS instance.
DiscoverRDS discovers RDS instances.
ChangeSecurityChecks enables/disables Security Thread Tool checks or changes their interval by names.
GetSecurityCheckResults returns Security Thread Tool's latest checks results.
ListSecurityChecks returns a list of available Security Thread Tool checks.
StartSecurityChecks executes Security Thread Tool checks and returns when all checks are executed.
post.description: All the available checks will be started if check names aren't specified.

post.summary: RemoveService removes Service with Agents.

get.summary:
Readiness returns an error when some PMM Server component is not ready yet or is being restarted.
It can be used as for Docker health check or Kubernetes readiness probe.

status.description:
AgentStatus represents actual Agent status.

 - STARTING: Agent is starting.
 - RUNNING: Agent is running.
 - WAITING: Agent encountered error and will be restarted automatically soon.
 - STOPPING: Agent is stopping.
 - DONE: Agent finished.
 - UNKNOWN: Agent is not connected, we don't know anything about it's state.

type_url.description:
A URL/resource name that uniquely identifies the type of the serialized
protocol buffer message. This string must contain at least
one "/" character. The last segment of the URL's path must represent
the fully qualified name of the type (as in
`path/google.protobuf.Duration`). The name should be in a canonical form
(e.g., leading "." is not accepted).

In practice, teams usually precompile into the binary all types that they
expect it to use in the context of Any. However, for URLs which use the
scheme `http`, `https`, or no scheme, one can optionally set up a type
server that maps type URLs to message definitions as follows:

* If no scheme is provided, `https` is assumed.
* An HTTP GET on the URL must yield a [google.protobuf.Type][]
  value in binary format, or produce an error.
* Applications are allowed to cache lookup results based on the
  URL, or have them precompiled into a binary to avoid any
  lookup. Therefore, binary compatibility needs to be preserved
  on changes to types. (Use versioned type names to manage
  breaking changes.)

Note: this functionality is not currently available in the official
protobuf release, and it is not used for type URLs beginning with
type.googleapis.com.

Schemes other than `http`, `https` (or the empty scheme) might be
used with implementation specific semantics.

value.description: Must be a valid serialized protocol buffer of the above specified type.

status.description:
AgentStatus represents actual Agent status.

 - STARTING: Agent is starting.
 - RUNNING: Agent is running.
 - WAITING: Agent encountered error and will be restarted automatically soon.
 - STOPPING: Agent is stopping.
 - DONE: Agent finished.
 - UNKNOWN: Agent is not connected, we don't know anything about it's state.

enable_push_metrics.description:
Enables push metrics with vmagent, can't be used with disable_push_metrics.
Can't be used with agent version lower then 2.12 and unsupported agents.

disable_push_metrics.description: Disables push metrics, pmm-server starts to pull it, can't be used with enable_push_metrics.
